message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. Given its features and benefits, I'm offering it at a starting price of $20,000.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. While I'm interested in the product, $20,000 is quite a bit higher than my budget allows. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest and counter-offer.  While I understand your budget constraints, the product's value is significantly higher than your offer.  I'm willing to come down to $17,000. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $17,000 is still outside my price range. I'm happy to meet you halfway at $14,000.  This would be a fair deal for both of us.
